title: Idol-kun wa Koi wo Shiranai
original_name: アイドルくんは恋を知らないっ
sinopse:
"It's my first time experiencing this feeling... So please, be my 'friend'!"

The popular idol Hinato attends a part-time school while hiding the fact that he's an idol. Meanwhile, he wants to become closer to the only person that he gets along with, Tomoya, so he confesses, but...

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)
